section_purpose: To visually present the evolution of literal embeddings over time during the message-passing process of the GNN, using dimensionality reduction.
key_points: The embeddings of literals evolve over the course of the message-passing process.
Visualization captures 6 different time steps from a total of 30 used for a specific example.
16-dimensional literal embedding vectors are projected into 2D for visualization using the UMAP algorithm.

algorithms: UMAP (Uniform Manifold Approximation and Projection) algorithm for dimensionality reduction from 16D to 2D

dependencies: Understanding of the GNN's message-passing process (likely from Section 2.4 or S.2)
Concept of literal embeddings (from earlier sections or S.2)
reproducibility_notes: Use UMAP algorithm for 2D projection of 16-dimensional embeddings.
Track embeddings at multiple time steps (e.g., 6 steps from a 30-step process).
